official_title: A bill to exempt certain charter boats in the United States Virgin Islands from the entry requirements of the Customs laws.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to exempt from the entry requirements of the Act those charterboats carrying passengers for hire on excursion from the U.S. Virgin Islands to the British Virgin Islands and return.

titles.title: A bill to exempt certain charter boats in the United States Virgin Islands from the entry requirements of the Customs laws.
